name: Command Line Mazer
description:
Command Line Mazer is a casual strategy game using Unix-like command-line interface. You will command virus to gather resources while avoiding being caught by anti-virus.

  • use unix-like command-line interface to interact with virus
  • avoid anti-virus to gather resources
  • very challenge anti-virus
  • can play with iron-man mode

*** Please make sure you played the demo before purchasing the game. ***
